## Module project {-}

```{go}
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	for age := 0; age < 99; age++ {
		switch age {
		case 16:
			fmt.Println("When you're", age, "you can drive a car!")
		case 18:
			fmt.Println("When you're", age, "you can buy a lottery ticket!")
		case 21:
			fmt.Println("When you're", age, "you can buy some beer!")
			break
		default:
			continue
		}
	}
}
```
